title: Easy Chocolate Chip Oat Bars
directions: Grease 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix sugar, margarine, flour, baking soda, salt and oatmeal. Pat 2/3 of mixture into pan. Melt margarine, chocolate chips and sweetened condensed milk. Pour chocolate mixture into pan over oatmeal mixture. Sprinkle remaining 1/3 of oatmeal mixture over chocolate. Bake at 350 degrees for about 20 minutes.
ingredients: 1 14 oz. can of sweetened condensed milk
